feed.title: A simple backup scheme for wallet accounts

entry.title: A simple backup scheme for wallet accounts
entry.summary: In the process of refining documentation or communication materials, it's crucial to be mindful of the language and descriptors used. A recent update was made to emphasize caution against pairing certain terms with specific descriptors that might not accurately reflect the intended message or could lead to misunderstandings. This adjustment aims to enhance clarity and ensure that the information conveyed aligns more closely with the desired interpretation.
